name: Sven Ludvig Lovén
obverse: Bust of Sven Ludvig Lovén facing right.
obverse_inscriptions: SVENO LOVÉN MUSEI ZOOL. REGNI PRÆFECTUS.
reverse: Inscription in 7 lines enclosed in a wreath.
reverse_inscriptions: SOCIO MERITISSIMO OB OFFICIA INSIGNIA PER DECEM LUSTRA MUSEO ZOOL. REGNI PRÆSTITIA REG. ACAD. SC. SUEC. MDCCCXCI.
description: Sven Ludvig Lovén (6 January 1809 – 3 September 1895), was a Swedish marine zoologist and malacologist.
